nodes.text: The Sith Tenebrae was born in a village on the agriworld of Medriaas in 5113 BBY. The village was located on the planet's remote northern continent, far from his father, the Sith Lord Dramath. Tenebrae killed his mother and adoptive father when he was six and began to torture the other villagers as he took control of the surrounding region, and the village was largely demolished when he built his palace in 5100 BBY after becoming Lord Vitiate and renaming the planet Nathema.
